sense.gloss: to feel shy, to be bashful, to blush

sdata.j: トムってね、メアリーが↑頬↑↓ほお↓を↑赤↑↓あか↓らめ|↑恥↑↓は↓じらう|↑姿↑↓すがた↓に↑一目惚↑↓ひとめぼ↓れしたらしいよ。
sdata.e: Tom seems to have fallen in love with Mary at first sight looking embarrassed and blushing.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓も|↑恥↑↓は↓じらう|↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓たちに↑囲↑↓かこ↓まれ、トムは↑緊張↑↓きんちょう↓を↑隠↑↓かく↓せなかった。
sdata.e: Tom couldn't hide his nervousness at being surrounded by a group of excessively lovely maidens.
